DOC.criteria: Women 1852 year old Body weight ≤ 70 kg Body mass index ( BMI ) , 18.530 kg/m2 Adequate vitamin A status ( SR ≥ 0.7 μmol/L , n=20 ) Inadequate vitamin A status ( SR < 0.7 μmol/L , n=20 ) No major medical illness ( know infection , gastrointestinal metabolic disorder ) Pregnancy lactation Regular intake medication ( except oral contraceptive ) Blood donation significant blood loss ( accident , surgery ) past 4 month Currently participate another clinical trial participate another clinical trial last 3 month prior begin study Former participation study involve administration iron stable isotope
